name: HAYES FAMILY LIMITED PARTNERSHIP et al. v. TOWN OF GLASTONBURY
name_abbreviation: Hayes Family Ltd. v. Town of Glastonbury

parties:
HAYES FAMILY LIMITED PARTNERSHIP et al.
v.
TOWN OF GLASTONBURY
attorneys: The plaintiffs' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 166 Conn.App. 585, 142 A.3d 408 (2016), is denied.
casebody.head_matter:
HAYES FAMILY LIMITED PARTNERSHIP et al.
v.
TOWN OF GLASTONBURY
Supreme Court of Connecticut.
Decided September 13, 2016
Richard P. Weinstein, in support of the petition.
Matthew Ranetti and Andrea L. Gomes, in opposition.
The plaintiffs' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 166 Conn.App. 585, 142 A.3d 408 (2016), is denied.
